fields.Name: Manamune (Crystal Scar)
fields.Description: +25 Attack Damage +250 Mana +25% Base Mana Regen UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Grants bonus Attack Damage equal to 2% of maximum Mana. UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +8 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each basic attack, spell cast, and Mana expenditure (occurs up to 2 times every 6 seconds). Transforms into Muramana at +750 Mana. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
